snippet: The Israeli Parliament passed legislation on Tuesday allowing for the detention of African migrants and asylum seekers who enter the country illegally for up to a year without trial.
abstract: Israeli Parliament passes legislation allowing for the detention of African migrants and asylum seekers who enter the country illegally for up to a year without trial.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli Parliament passed legislation on Tuesday allowing for the detention of African migrants and asylum seekers who enter the country illegally for up to a year without trial.
